physical_appearance:\The print depicts a Japanese lady sitting on a tatami floor. She is wearing a kimono and is facing away from the direction in which the photograph is taken. She is looking into a mirror on a small dressing table that holds three white containers as well. The lady is holding a comb in her left hand and is using it to tidy her hair. At the lower right hand side of the print
 the number \\26\\ is displayed in white. \

She is looking into a mirror on a small dressing table that holds three white containers as well. The lady is holding a comb in her left hand and is using it to tidy her hair. At the lower right hand side of the print, the number ""26"" is displayed in white. "
